snippet.title: Control - AWE Expansion Trailer
snippet.description:
In AWE, Director Jesse Faden has to enter the Investigations Sector to chase down a mysterious being that’s been stalking this long-abandoned area for years. In order to reclaim the Investigations Sector for the Bureau, Jesse will need to explore the numerous Altered World Events (AWEs) investigated here, including one from the town of Bright Falls, which concerns the missing writer, Alan Wake.

AWE, the second and final expansion for @ControlRemedy, launches August 27 on PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

In addition, all owners of Control will receive a FREE August update. 

Get Control: http://controlgame.com

For more information on Control, AWE, and to stay up to date with the latest information, visit the official game website and be sure to follow Control on our social channels. 

Website: http://controlgame.com/ 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/Control.Remedy/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ControlRemedy 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/ControlRemedy/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/control 

Remedy Entertainment website: http://remedygames.com
Facebook: https://facebook.com/remedygames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/remedygames
Instagram: https://instagram.com/remedygames
Discord: https://discord.gg/remedygames
